reviews.review: Potato

I fully recommend Portal 2, hands down, 100%.

It is a great expansion on the original game, and its new multiplayer feature is a brilliant idea for building teamwork and making you continue to think about physics (and portals) in a different way.

A must-have to complete the set, for any gamer.

Buy it! No hesitation! Just buy it!

W tej grze było dużo nowych możliwości w stosunku do Portala 1, ale mimo wszystko dalej za mało. Poziomów też nie było wiele i były zbyt proste. Mechanika powinna być jeszcze bardziej rozbudowana i jeśli Portal 3 kiedykolwiek powstanie, to liczę na coś dłuższego, bardziej wymagającego i skomplikowanego. W sensie, że więcej możliwości, a nie tylko same portale, kulki, kostki, te żele itd. Coś jeszcze by się przydało :)

Historia była spoko, tylko troszkę jakby na siłę miejscami wymyślana. Ale i tak mi się ona podobała. Portal 2 było jakby żywsze niż 1, z racji pewnie Weathleya i konkretnej historii, a nie jakiegoś tajemniczego zakładu.

Gra spoko, ale moim zdaniem nie zasługuje na tak wysoką ocenę. 7/10, bo mogłaby być lepsza.

Portal 2 tem puzzles insanos de decentes e agora vc tbm pode jogar com um amigo,mas n pense que isso facilita algo pois os puzzles para o modo de 2 jogadores sao insanos em leveis mais alto.

ABSOLUTELY INCREDIBLE GAME. And I thought the first one was great...I didn't know that it could be this brilliant. The storyline was absolutely incredible! And the history behind GLaDoS and Aperture Science is heartbreaking. And Wheatley, the little blighter, is Hillarious. simply hillarious. Brilliantly done. If you want to play a game that stimulates your thoughts, has a very in depth and emotional storyline, and has beautifully done graphics, This is it. Highly Highly reccomend.

Now I've already played this game to death as well as the first one, but my feelings for both haven't changed. Portal 2 still remains to be one of my favourite games of all time. The gameplay mechanics are spot-on and the challenges never feel too frustrating or out of place.

But I believe the writing is this game's greatest achievement. The dialogue conversations between Chell and GlaDOS have never been funnier, and the chemistry between each of the characters is marvelous. I always had a laugh when playing through this game, and it's rare that a game does that for me.

Buy this game. I assure you that you shan't be disappointed!

In Portal one, you wake up in some hospital after getting shanked at the nearby stripclub. You are then forced by some Robot thing named GlaDos to do some activites, and if you don't you die, but get this, if you do all the life threatening obstacles, you get a fucking cake to compensate for the fact that you probably died at least 100 times playing that shitty game. BUT PORTAL 2 IS REVOLUTIONARY. IN PORTAL 2 GLADOS IS A FUCKING POTATO THAT CAN'T DO SHIT TO YOU NOW, JOKES ON THAT BITCH, NOW SHE'S JUST HIGH IN CARBS. Then some British dude takes over Aperture and you have to beat him. but jokes on him, because you send him into fucking space, that's right, you heard it, SPACE. IMO ClapTrap is still the greatest robot of all time, but GLaDoS is an easy second.

I would rate this game a solid 9.9/10

Might be one of the games with the funniest story to follow according to me. Anyone who loves good sarcasm will love this game. CO-OP mode really makes you use cooperative thinking, or else you will fail. Simple as that. Great game.

Playing Portal and Portal 2 has been an amazing experience. Both games involve using a portal gun to create portals to solve puzzles. These puzzles are very interesting and fun. If you enjoyed Portal then you will love Portal 2 also. 

Playing in co-op with a friend is so much fun! You both have to work out what each person needs to do to solve the puzzle. The puzzle cannot be solved without the other person's help. 

I definitely recommend both Portal and Portal 2. Play the first one before you play this one.
jeux super avec de bon graphic (deuxieme acte un peux ennuyen mais il se ratrape sur le dernier)

Сперва исследования оказались под угрозой. Великолепное начало, забавные сценки – и тут вы понимаете, что подопытная из предыдущей части оказывается в тех же самых условиях, наблюдение проводят знакомые нам механизмы – да еще и сложность загадок нарочно занижена. Тем более, большинство новых устройств было так разрекламировано еще в прошлом году, что может быть, уже собирается где-нибудь в Китае. И это не говоря о том, что чудесные прыгучие гели появятся в игре на третьем, а если туго соображать – то и на четвертом часу игры.

Вот так, вместо спойлеров мы решили вывалить на вас все недостатки Portal 2 - так сказать, предупредили об опасности экспериментов, на которые подписываетесь. Как оказалось, упрощение начальных головоломок на самом деле и не печалит – авторы дали шанс тем, кто ненавидит кислотные бассейны, платформы и загадки на скорость. Даже к сапогам пружинки приделали, чтобы не дай Бог кто-нибудь разбился. Если вы не мыслите жизни без трудностей – играючи пробегите первые камеры или сразу отправляйтесь в совместное прохождение. Только в таком случае, рискуете пропустить секретные комнаты и прочие «пасхалки» от разработчиков – вроде вот этой, нашей любимой.

This is the best game ever. With an amazing story, awesome voice acting, great co-op game and in-depth level creator, plus so much more, theis game took the already good game of portal, and tripled everything good about it. Portal 2 takes place several years after the original Portal, and you and a little robot named wheatly must try to escape the facility. This game has awesome plot-twists for a puzzle game like this, and I reccemend everyone to buy this game, it is worth it. This is now my favorite game and will probably be for a really long time, maybe until a Portal 3 comes out, if it ever does. Please play this game; it is amazing!
Best Game I have every played. Great story and gameplay also challenging
Fantastic! Absolutely good storyline! I loved every single minute of playing it. I played through the whole game four times!
Great story and writing, fun new mechanics to play around with and an added co-op mode. Great sequel to an already fun game!
